mapper.delete:
delete from monitoring where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select sum(if((status='1'),1,0)) as openNum,sum(if((status='2'),1,0)) as closeNum from monitoring

SELECT sum( IF ( ( STATUS = '1' AND machine_type = #{type} ), 1, 0 ) ) AS run, sum( IF ( ( abnormal_condition IS NULL AND machine_type = #{type} ), 1, 0 ) ) AS normal, sum( IF ( ( abnormal_condition IS NOT NULL AND machine_type = #{type}), 1, 0 ) ) AS abnormal FROM monitoring

choose.when:
SELECT belong_floor from monitoring
where user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY belong_floor
choose.otherwise:
SELECT belong_region from monitoring
where user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY belong_region

mapper.select: select COUNT(1) as repaireNum from monitoring where prop1 in ('1','2')

SELECT monitor_mode_code monitorModeCode from monitoring
and user_id = #{userId} and machine_type = #{machineType} and (flow1 = '0' or flow2 = '0' or flow3 = '0' or flow4 = '0' or flow5 = '0') and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(prop6) > 0 and prop6 IS NOT NULL AND prop6 <> ''
GROUP BY monitor_mode_code
SELECT * from monitoring where user_id=#{userId} and machine_type=#{machineType} group by belong_region
